title: MYTH BUSTED: Did Trump Praise Nazis as “Very Fine People”? | Louder with Crowder
description: Steven Crowder takes to the streets to see how aware your average voter is of Trump's many denunciations of white supremacy and sees whether this context changes their opinion on his "fine people on both sides" comments.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
